product.name: Gambardella, Matthew
product.description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

product.name: Ralls, Kim
product.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

product.name: Corets, Eva
product.description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.
